User Guide
There are nine main parts in the home of this app.
1.Contact Creator and list At the top,there is a contact creator and contact list.You can save name,phone number,email and address.And can warch the save list using the aplication.
2.Education Sector There is a education sector for only the Khulna division.By clicking on this sector, you can get the list of schools,colleges and university.
3.Hospital Service There are some numbers of hospitals of Khulna division.By clicking on this sector, you can get the list of hospital's number.
4.Police Services There are some numbers of police stations of Khulna division.In this application I add the numbers of different duty officers.
5.Fire Service There are some numbers of fire service of Khulna division.By clicking on this sector, you can get the list of fire service's number.
6.Ticket Counter There are some numbers of fire service of Khulna division.I add the number of bus,train,airlines in the our application.
7.Hotel And Restaurant There are some numbers of hotel and restaurant of Khulna division.By clicking on this sector, you can get the list of restaurant's number and can contact with restaurant.
8.Map We add the map in our application.So that, you can see the location of our application information.Also can see your current location.
9.Browser In search option we add google.com page link.By using browser you can also get more information.
